full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Transformation Advisory Services

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01006493
**Solicitation Number:** 01B68-22-0059
**Publication Date:** 2022-09-08

**Tender Closing Date:** 2022-09-27T12:00:00
**Contact Information:**
Rhonda DiMarco
rhonda.dimarco@agr.gc.ca

#### Contract Overview
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada invites Bidder to provide Transformation Advisory Services, as per Solicitation Number 01B68-22-0059. The tender is open only to TSPS Supply Agreement Holders who are qualified under Tier 1 for Services in the National Capital Region.

#### Request for Proposal
The contract will provide the services of a Senior Change Management Consultant on an as-and-when required basis to support the Transformation and Modernization Services directorate within Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada’s Information Systems Branch. The Change Management Consultant must provide strategic advice and facilitation services to support TMS Executives or other designated groups during this period of significant internal transformation.

#### Tender Requirements
* Date of contract period: From contract award to March 31, 2023
* Security requirement level: Common PS SRCL#6 – Reliability
* Total estimated Level of Effort: As Required
* Total estimated number of contracts: 1

#### Supply Arrangement
The Services Professional Centred on Tasks and Solutions (TSPS) Method of Supply is refreshed three (3) times per year. If you wish to find out how you can be a Qualified SA Holder, please contact RCNMDAI.

#### Trade Agreements
This bid solicitation is being issued to satisfy the requirement of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada for the provision of Task and Solutions Professional Services under the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement

#### Acknowledgement

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language. BIDDERS ARE ADVISED THAT “BUYANDSELL.GC.CA” IS NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR THE DISTRIBUTION OF SOLICITATION DOCUMENTS. By participating in this tender, bidders acknowledge that they have read, understood, and accepted the terms and conditions set out in the procurement document.

### Important Notes
* Please ensure that your tender complies with the requirements outlined in the procurement document.
* Only qualified
